name: Iqclasses
tagline: Classes Created by Mohd Iftekhar Qurashi for public use.
body:
## Welcome to IQClasses.

iOS, Objectve-C Helper classes.

###CGGeometry+Extension
Simple CGGeometry extension C functions to simplify your Geometry calculations.
https://github.com/hackiftekhar/IQClasses/tree/master/CGGeometry%2BExtension

###CountryStateDemo
This is a demo project. CountryStateHandler iOS classes used to handle Country List and State list according to Country.
https://github.com/hackiftekhar/IQClasses/tree/master/CountryStateDemo

###Keyboard TextField Manager
Use this classes to handle UITextField and iOS UIKeyboard. so your textfield will not be hide by Keyboard
https://github.com/hackiftekhar/IQClasses/tree/master/KeyboardTextFieldDemo

###CoreData Helper
Demo project contains coreData helper classes. Use CoreDataHelper to handle all the CoreData related query. Just drag and drop in your project and use it as you want.
https://github.com/hackiftekhar/IQClasses/tree/master/CoreDataDemo

If you found any bugs, please report it to hack.iftekhar@gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
